name: LazyChef
0:
”Alexa, ask Lazy Chef what I should make”
”Alexa, ask Lazy Chef to suggest a meal”
”Alexa, ask Lazy Chef what I can make using Peanut Butter”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lazy chef
des:
Use this skill to get ideas for simple meals that take less than 5 minutes to prepare and use only 1, 2, or a maximum of 3 ingredients (not including seasoning, those are up to you).

NEW UPDATE---
You can now ask Lazy Chef what to make based on the main ingredient of your choice (using our selected ingredients list, more recipes coming soon!).

Think you've got a great dish we're missing? Let us know! We'll add the best suggestions to the Lazy Chef's repertoire.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
